ApproxsimClient.map
Class StratMap

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.map.BasicMap
      ApproxsimClient.map.StratMap

public class StratMap
extends BasicMap

APPROXSIM map controller.
This class contains references to the main map as well as the panel components which controls display of the map.
